name: MAGATAMA Earrings
description: Magatama Earrings is an easy to pick up, turn-based RPG inspired by classic JRPGs such as Dragon Quest. Set out to battle an assortment of colorful monsters as the courageous little Cello. The world of Yohoo is turning Wahoo, and only you can stop it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Memory: 300 MB RAM Storage: 350 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Pretty entertaining game . The game starts corny - I'm going to save the world . The game is simple but yet beautiful 3D picture . Great music. 10/10 for ' I'm going to save the world , but my mother would say that leaving '
